channel.title: Grizzly Bear on mattischrome

item.title: Album Digest, September 2012
item.description: I had a bit more time to listen to this month’s albums because I was on holiday for two weeks. I didn’t manage to write about them while on holiday though! In fact I bought and listened to a few more, but I will save them for next month. The albums I will discuss now (in order bought) are:
